Segment.name: SV1
Segment.comment: To specify the claim service detail for a Health Care professional

Field.name: CompositeMedicalProcedureIdentifier
Field.comment: To identify a medical procedure by its standardized codes and applicable modifiers

Field.name: MonetaryAmount1
Field.comment: Monetary amount

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Quantity
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: FacilityCodeValue
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of facility where services were performed; the first and second positions of the Uniform Bill Type code or the Place of Service code from the Electronic Media Claims National Standard Format

Field.name: ServiceTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the classification of service

Field.name: CompositeDiagnosisCodePointer
Field.comment: To identify one or more diagnosis code pointers

Field.name: MonetaryAmount2
Field.comment: Monetary amount

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: MultipleProcedureCode
Field.comment: Code indicating proper adjudication and payment determination in cases involving multiple surgical procedures during the same surgical session

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode3
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: ReviewCode
Field.comment: Code identifying extenuating circumstances or justifications which might assist any review of the medical necessity for this service

Field.name: NationalOrLocalAssignedReviewValue
Field.comment: Value assigned by national or local organizations for various healthcare data elements

Field.name: CopayStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether or not co-payment requirements were met on a line by line basis

Field.name: HealthCareProfessionalShortageAreaCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the Health Care Professional Shortage Area Code (HPSA)

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: PostalCode
Field.comment: Code defining international postal zone code excluding punctuation and blanks (zip code for United States)

Field.name: MonetaryAmount3
Field.comment: Monetary amount

Field.name: LevelOfCareCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the level of care provided by a nursing home facility

Field.name: ProviderAgreementCode
